ðŸ“– Summary: Flow-Like is a visual workflow automation platform built with Rust, designed for enterprise-scale projects. It allows users to create automated workflows using a drag-and-drop interface, providing a clear record of data flow and changes. It supports AI integration, customizability, and deployment across various environments.
